text:

When you think of McDonald's you immediately visualize a succulent Big Mac with the classic McDonald's fries.

The American fast-food company has become a firm favourite with restaurants all over the world. The long-running fast-food chain might be famous for hamburgers, but franchises around the world offer more on their menu than what you might be used to.

Thailand has a few of these unique items - enjoy fried chicken, corn pies or even rice and chicken.

On your next travel, perhaps pop into the local McDonald's and discover some new tastes from the happy clown.
